segments.text: Ugh, what a sloppy mess this kitchen has become.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink's overflowing with water gushing out uncontrollably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's soaking the cabinet doors and pooling on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That woman stands there, one foot in the puddle, drying dishes like an idiot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's clueless, her apron probably getting splattered next.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stacked dishes on the counter are in danger of the spray.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those brats are climbing for cookies in the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's balancing on that flimsy stool, hand deep in the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's just hovering, begging for her piece of the theft.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sneaking treats like thatâ€”disgraceful when there's a flood happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole place reeks of neglect and mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the pretty garden view can't hide this indoor filth.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand watching such avoidable sloppiness.
segments.speaker: PAR
